001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.ServiceLoader;
008import java.util.UUID;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
010import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
011import java.util.function.Consumer;
012import java.util.function.Function;
013import java.util.function.Supplier;
014
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties.Property;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogRouter.RootRouter;
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogRouter.Router;
018import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
019
020//@formatter:off
021/**
022 * The main entrypoint and configuration of RainbowGum logging.
023 * <p>
024 * RainbowGum logging loads configuration through the service loader. While you can
025 * manually set RainbowGum using {@link #set(Supplier)} it is better to register
026 * implementations through the ServiceLoader so that RainbowGum will load prior to any
027 * external logging.
028 * <p>
029 * To register a custom RainbowGum:
030 *
031 *
032{@snippet class="snippets.RainbowGumProviderExample" region="provider" :
033
034class RainbowGumProviderExample implements RainbowGumProvider {
035
036        @Override
037        public Optional<RainbowGum> provide(LogConfig config) {
038
039                Property<Integer> bufferSize = Property.builder()
040                        .map(Integer::parseInt)
041                        .orElse(1024)
042                        .build("logging.custom.async.bufferSize");
043
044                Property<LogOutput> output = Property.builder()
045                        .map(URI::create)
046                        .map(u -> config.output(u, ""))
047                        .orElse(LogOutput.ofStandardOut())
048                        .build("logging.custom.output");
049
050                var gum = RainbowGum.builder() //
051                        .route(r -> {
052                                r.publisher(PublisherFactory.async().bufferSize(bufferSize.get(config.properties()).value()).build());
053                                r.appender("console", a -> {
054                                        a.output(output.get(config.properties()).value());                                      
055                                });
056                                r.level(Level.INFO);
057                        })
058                        .build();
059
060                return Optional.of(gum);
061        }
062
063}
064}
065 */
066//@formatter:on
067public sealed interface RainbowGum extends AutoCloseable, LogEventLogger {
068
069        /**
070         * Gets the currently statically bound RainbowGum.
071         * @return current RainbowGum.
072         */
073        public static RainbowGum of() {
074                return RainbowGumHolder.get();
075        }
076
077        /**
078         * Provides the service loader default based RainbowGum.
079         * @return rainbowgum.
080         */
081        public static RainbowGum defaults() {
082                return RainbowGumServiceProvider.provide();
083        }
084
085        /**
086         * Sets the global default RainbowGum. The supplied {@link RainbowGum} must not
087         * already be started.
088         * @param supplier the supplier will be memoized when {@linkplain Supplier#get()
089         * accessed} and {@link RainbowGum#start()} will be called.
090         */
091        public static void set(Supplier<RainbowGum> supplier) {
092                RainbowGumHolder.set(supplier);
093        }
094
095        /**
096         * The config assocated with this instance.
097         * @return config.
098         */
099        public LogConfig config();
100
101        /**
102         * The router that will route log messages to publishers.
103         * @return router
104         */
105        public RootRouter router();
106
107        /**
108         * Starts the rainbow gum and returns it. It is returned for try-with usage
109         * convenience.
110         * @return the started rainbowgum.
111         */
112        default RainbowGum start() {
113                router().start(config());
114                return this;
115        }
116
117        /**
118         * Unique id of rainbow gum instance.
119         * @return random id created on creation.
120         */
121        public UUID instanceId();
122
123        /**
124         * Will close the rainbowgum and all registered components as well as removed from the
125         * shutdown hooks. If the rainbow gum is set as global it will no longer be global and
126         * replaced with the bootstrapping in memory queue. {@inheritDoc}
127         */
128        public void close();
129
130        /**
131         * This append call is mainly for testing as it does not avoid making events that do
132         * not need to be made if no logging needs to be done. {@inheritDoc}
133         */
134        @Override
135        default void log(LogEvent event) {
136                var r = router().route(event.loggerName(), event.level());
137                if (r.isEnabled()) {
138                        r.log(event);
139                }
140        }
141
142        /**
143         * Use to build a custom {@link RainbowGum} which will use the {@link LogConfig}
144         * provided by the service loader.
145         * @return builder.
146         */
147        public static Builder builder() {
148                ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class);
149                var config = RainbowGumServiceProvider.provideConfig(loader);
150                return builder(config);
151        }
152
153        /**
154         * Use to build a custom {@link RainbowGum} with supplied config.
155         * @param config the config
156         * @return builder.
157         * @see #builder()
158         */
159        public static Builder builder(LogConfig config) {
160                return new Builder(config);
161        }
162
163        /**
164         * Use to build a custom {@link RainbowGum} with supplied config.
165         * @param config consumer that has first argument as config builder.
166         * @return builder.
167         * @see #builder()
168         * @apiNote this method is for ergonomic fluent reasons.
169         */
170        public static Builder builder(Consumer<? super LogConfig.Builder> config) {
171                var b = LogConfig.builder();
172                config.accept(b);
173                return builder(b.build());
174        }
175
176        /**
177         * RainbowGum Builder.
178         */
179        public class Builder {
180
181                private final LogConfig config;
182
183                private final List<Router> routes = new ArrayList<>();
184
185                private Builder(LogConfig config) {
186                        this.config = config;
187                }
188
189                /**
190                 * Adds a router.
191                 * @param route a router.
192                 * @return builder.
193                 */
194                public Builder route(Router route) {
195                        this.routes.add(route);
196                        return this;
197                }
198
199                /**
200                 * Adds a route by using a consumer of the route builder.
201                 * @param name name of router.
202                 * @param consumer consumer is passed router builder. The consumer does not need
203                 * to call {@link Router#builder(String,LogConfig)}
204                 * @return builder.
205                 * @see io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogRouter.Router.Builder
206                 */
207                public Builder route(String name, Consumer<Router.Builder> consumer) {
208                        var builder = Router.builder(name, config);
209                        consumer.accept(builder);
210                        return route(builder.build());
211                }
212
213                /**
214                 * Adds a route by using a consumer of the route builder.
215                 * @param consumer consumer is passed router builder. The consumer does not need
216                 * to call {@link Router#builder(String,LogConfig)}
217                 * @return builder.
218                 * @see io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogRouter.Router.Builder
219                 */
220                public Builder route(Consumer<Router.Builder> consumer) {
221                        var builder = Router.builder(Router.DEFAULT_ROUTER_NAME, config);
222                        consumer.accept(builder);
223                        return route(builder.build());
224                }
225
226                /**
227                 * Builds an unstarted {@link RainbowGum}.
228                 * @return an unstarted {@link RainbowGum}.
229                 */
230                public RainbowGum build() {
231                        return build(UUID.randomUUID());
232                }
233
234                /**
235                 * Builds an unstarted {@link RainbowGum}.
236                 * @param instanceId unique id for rainbow gum instance.
237                 * @return an unstarted {@link RainbowGum}.
238                 */
239                private RainbowGum build(UUID instanceId) {
240                        var routes = this.routes;
241                        var config = this.config;
242                        if (routes.isEmpty()) {
243                                List<String> routeNames = Property.builder() //
244                                        .toList()
245                                        .orElse(List.of())
246                                        .build(LogProperties.ROUTES_PROPERTY)
247                                        .get(config.properties())
248                                        .value();
249                                if (routeNames.isEmpty()) {
250                                        routes = List.of(Router.builder(Router.DEFAULT_ROUTER_NAME, config).build());
251                                }
252                                else {
253                                        routes = routeNames.stream().map(n -> Router.builder(n, config).build()).toList();
254                                }
255                        }
256                        var root = InternalRootRouter.of(routes, config.levelResolver());
257                        return new SimpleRainbowGum(config, root, instanceId);
258                }
259
260                /**
261                 * Builds, starts and sets the RainbowGum as the global one picked up by logging
262                 * facades.
263                 * @return started and set rainbow that can be used in a try-close.
264                 */
265                public RainbowGum set() {
266                        UUID instanceId = UUID.randomUUID();
267                        RainbowGum.set(() -> build(instanceId));
268                        var gum = RainbowGum.of();
269                        /*
270                         * TODO this is a hack. The holder lock should be used to make this not
271                         * happen.
272                         */
273                        if (!instanceId.equals(gum.instanceId())) {
274                                throw new IllegalStateException("Another rainbow gum registered itself as the global. "
275                                                + "This is rare reace condition and probably a bug");
276                        }
277                        return gum;
278                }
279
280                /**
281                 * For returning an optional for the Provider contract.
282                 * @return optional that always has a rainbow gum.
283                 * @apiNote this method is for ergonomics.
284                 */
285                public Optional<RainbowGum> optional() {
286                        return Optional.of(this.build());
287                }
288
289                /**
290                 * For returning an optional for the Provider contract.
291                 * @param condition condition to check if this rainbow gum should be used.
292                 * @return optional rainbow gum.
293                 * @apiNote this method is for ergonomics.
294                 */
295                public Optional<RainbowGum> optional(Function<? super LogConfig, Boolean> condition) {
296                        var cond = condition.apply(config);
297                        if (cond) {
298                                return Optional.of(this.build());
299                        }
300                        return Optional.empty();
301                }
302
303        }
304
305}
306
307final class RainbowGumHolder {
308
309        private static final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
310
311        private static Supplier<RainbowGum> supplier = RainbowGumServiceProvider::provide;
312
313        private static volatile RainbowGum rainbowGum = null;
314
315        static RainbowGum get() {
316                lock.readLock().lock();
317                try {
318                        var r = rainbowGum;
319                        if (r != null) {
320                                return r;
321                        }
322                }
323                finally {
324                        lock.readLock().unlock();
325                }
326                if (lock.writeLock().isHeldByCurrentThread()) {
327                        throw new IllegalStateException("RainbowGum component tried to log too early. "
328                                        + "This is usually caused by dependencies calling logging.");
329                }
330                lock.writeLock().lock();
331                try {
332                        var r = rainbowGum;
333                        if (r != null) {
334                                return r;
335                        }
336                        r = supplier.get();
337                        start(r);
338                        rainbowGum = r;
339                        return r;
340
341                }
342                finally {
343                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
344                }
345
346        }
347
348        static boolean remove(RainbowGum gum) {
349                lock.writeLock().lock();
350                try {
351                        var original = rainbowGum;
352                        if (original != gum) {
353                                return false;
354                        }
355                        rainbowGum = null;
356                        supplier = RainbowGumServiceProvider::provide;
357                        return true;
358                }
359                finally {
360                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
361                }
362        }
363
364        static void set(Supplier<RainbowGum> rainbowGumSupplier) {
365                Objects.requireNonNull(rainbowGumSupplier);
366                if (lock.writeLock().isHeldByCurrentThread()) {
367                        throw new IllegalStateException("RainbowGum component tried to log too early. "
368                                        + "This is usually caused by dependencies calling logging.");
369                }
370                lock.writeLock().lock();
371                try {
372                        rainbowGum = null;
373                        supplier = rainbowGumSupplier;
374                }
375                finally {
376                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
377                }
378        }
379
380        private static void start(RainbowGum gum) {
381                Objects.requireNonNull(gum);
382                ShutdownManager.addShutdownHook(gum);
383                InternalRootRouter.setRouter(gum.router());
384                gum.start();
385        }
386
387}
388
389final class SimpleRainbowGum implements RainbowGum, Shutdownable {
390
391        private final LogConfig config;
392
393        private final RootRouter router;
394
395        private final AtomicInteger state = new AtomicInteger(0);
396
397        private final UUID instanceId;
398
399        private static final int INIT = 0;
400
401        private static final int STARTED = 1;
402
403        private static final int CLOSED = 2;
404
405        public SimpleRainbowGum(LogConfig config, RootRouter router, UUID instanceId) {
406                super();
407                this.config = config;
408                this.router = router;
409                this.instanceId = instanceId;
410        }
411
412        public LogConfig config() {
413                return this.config;
414        }
415
416        public RootRouter router() {
417                return this.router;
418        }
419
420        @Override
421        public RainbowGum start() {
422                int current;
423                if ((current = state.compareAndExchange(INIT, STARTED)) == INIT) {
424                        return RainbowGum.super.start();
425                }
426                throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot start. This rainbowgum is " + stateLabel(current));
427        }
428
429        @Override
430        public UUID instanceId() {
431                return this.instanceId;
432        }
433
434        @Override
435        public void close() {
436                if (state.compareAndSet(STARTED, CLOSED)) {
437                        RainbowGumHolder.remove(this);
438                        try {
439                                shutdown();
440                        }
441                        finally {
442                                ShutdownManager.removeShutdownHook(this);
443                        }
444                        return;
445                }
446        }
447
448        @Override
449        public void shutdown() {
450                router().close();
451        }
452
453        @Override
454        public String toString() {
455                return "SimpleRainbowGum [instanceId=" + instanceId + ", config=" + config + ", router=" + router + ", state="
456                                + stateLabel(state.get()) + "]";
457        }
458
459        private static String stateLabel(int state) {
460                return switch (state) {
461                        case INIT -> "created";
462                        case STARTED -> "started";
463                        case CLOSED -> "closed";
464                        default -> {
465                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("" + state);
466                        }
467                };
468        }
469
470}
